LanguageData.driedfruit.description: Fruit the has had the water removed.
LanguageData.Bread.label: bread
LanguageData.Bread.description: A very simple baked good. Since thousands of years humans bake and eat these tasty loafs.

LanguageData.sweetbun.description: A sweet roll covered in sugary icying. \n\nFood Effects: Consciousness and Moving.
LanguageData.grilledcheese.label: grilled cheese sandwich
LanguageData.grilledcheese.description: Two slices of bread grilled with cheese melt in the middle. \n\nFood Effects: Metabolism.
LanguageData.grilledmeat.label: Cheese Burger
LanguageData.grilledmeat.description: Two slices of bread with grilled meat and cheese melt. \n\nFood Effects: Metabolism.
LanguageData.pizza.label: pizza
LanguageData.pizza.description: Pizza in 30 minutes or less! \n\nFood Effects: Consciousness and Metabolism.
LanguageData.Porridge.label: Porridge
LanguageData.Porridge.description: A simple porridge cooked from grains. \n\nFood Effects: Sight and Blood Filtration.
LanguageData.yogurt.label: yogurt
LanguageData.yogurt.description: A sweet treat made from milk. \n\nFood Effects: Sight and Blood Filtration.
LanguageData.icecream.label: ice cream
LanguageData.icecream.description: A sweet frozen treat made from milk. \n\nFood Effects: Moving and Blood Pumping.
LanguageData.smoothie.label: smoothie
LanguageData.smoothie.description: A sweet drink made from fruit and milk. \n\nFood Effects: Sight and Moving.
LanguageData.Tacos.label: Tacos
LanguageData.Tacos.description: Meat and Cheese in a Corn shell. \n\nFood Effects: Manipulation and Metabolism.

LanguageData.Grilledsteak.description: Meat that has been cooked over a grill.

LanguageData.Grilledveg.description: Vegetables that have been cooked over a grill.
LanguageData.Kabob.label: Grilled Kabob
LanguageData.Kabob.description: Meats and/or Vegetables skewered on a stick and grilled to perfection.
LanguageData.grilledpolenta.label: grilled polenta
LanguageData.grilledpolenta.description: A loaf of Potenta that has been sliced and grilled to perfection. \n\nFood Effects: Manipulation and Metabolism.

LanguageData.bakedpolenta.description: Polenta that has been baked into a bread. \n\nFood Effects: Manipulation and Metabolism.

LanguageData.Cornbread.description: A very simple baked loaf of bread made from corn meal.

LanguageData.muffin.description: A sweet baked muffin made with fruit. \n\nFood Effects: Consciousness and Moving.
LanguageData.meatpie.label: meat pie
LanguageData.meatpie.description: A simple baked pie with a filling of meat.

LanguageData.Rawwheat.description: Wheat is a cereal grain, for milling into Flour.

LanguageData.Cornmeal.label: Cornmeal
LanguageData.VeganEgg.label: Vegan Egg Substitute
LanguageData.VeganEgg.description: Vegan Egg Substitute is a egg shape product made from tofu, potato, or banana. Used in place of eggs in baking and other recipes.
LanguageData.MakiRoll.label: Maki roll
LanguageData.MakiRoll.description: A Rolled dish of cold cooked rice served with a garnish of raw fish, vegetables, or egg.

LanguageData.Nigiri.description: A small ball of rice topped with raw fish or other seafood.

LanguageData.Caramel.description: A sweet candy made from sugar

LanguageData.Hardcandy.description: A hard candy made from sugar

LanguageData.SaltedMeat.description: Meat that has been cured with salt.

LanguageData.RawPolenta.label: Polenta
LanguageData.RawPolenta.description: Made from Cornmeal. Nice to eat, even when raw. Can be baked or grilled into fine meals.

LanguageData.PickledVeg.description: Vegetables that have been preserved in a salty brine.

LanguageData.Oven.description: A stone oven used for baking.

LanguageData.ElectricOven.description: A electric oven used for baking.
LanguageData.HandCanningstove.label: Fueled Food prep table
LanguageData.HandCanningstove.description: An unpowered version of the canning stove, food press, and prep table. Makes simple items. Requires 40% work to make items here.

LanguageData.Canningstove.description: An electric canning stove, food press, and prep table.

LanguageData.CookingTools.description: Increases work speed 14%. Needs to be placed near cooking tops. Will boost the cook speed of all tables near by.

LanguageData.GrindStone.description: A small muscle-powered grinding stone for grinding raw plants.

LanguageData.ElectricGrindStone.description: A small electric-powered grinding stone for quickly grinding raw plants.

LanguageData.ChunkSalt.description: Salt is used into preservation of foods.
